mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mt_confirm_log where USER_COUPON_ID = #{userCouponId} and status = 'A'
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mt_confirm_log where CREATE_TIME > #{beginTime} and CREATE_TIME <= #{endTime} and status = 'A'
select * from mt_confirm_log o where o.ORDER_ID = #{orderId} and status = 'A'
